extendedInfo.description: Feed your Garfield need with a daily dose of the classic comic! The Garfield Daily Comic Android app allows you to view every Garfield daily comic strip ever produced â thatâs over 12,300 strips! This awesome app has tons of features that allow you to search and share your favorite comic strips. Here are the nuts and bolts:You can browse through the comic strips by touching the Previous or Next navigation buttons or by touching either side of the comic strip. Resize the comic strip by tapping or pinching. So simple even Odie can do it!Like Garfield, this app is prone to nap attacks. After about 10 seconds of inactivity, the navigation, title, and toolbar will fade away. To bring them back, touch the middle of the comic strip. Touch again to have them disappear. Donât worry â you can still change comics by touching the edges.Have a special day in mind? Select any date since the beginning of the comic strip and then touch Set to see that day's comic strip. Easy-peasy-lemon-squeezy!Looking for a specific theme â like lasagna, lazy or lederhosen? Search strips by typing a keyword or theme and touching the Done button on the keyboard. Then you can navigate through that list of strips.Do you like surprises? Touch the Random button to see any strip selected by Odie. You never know what treasure awaits you (please be aware of probable drool).Wanna post a strip for all your Facebook friends to see? First you need to login to Facebook. Then, simply post the selected comic strip on your Facebook wall along with a typically brilliant comment.Wanna share a strip with your BFF? Email the selected comic and add a comment. You can also go to the Settings Page to activate your preference to put a copy of the comic strip into your Saved Photos folder on your Android when you email the strip.Canât get enough Garfield? On the Information page there is a More Garfield button which brings you to Garfieldâs website with lots of links and awesome info about the famous fat cat.So what are you waiting for? Get your paws on the Garfield Daily Comic Android App!

reviews.title: Basic with some bugs
reviews.comment: Buttons keep disappearing and I have to tap screen multi times for them to either come back, or stay invisible but comic progresses back one strip. Would be nice to favourite any strip.
reviews.author: Westrella Chroma

reviews.title: Freezes up.
reviews.comment: I been reading Garfield since it first came out in 1978 and I was 9 years old. I just wish now that this program would quit freezing up like it has been lately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: amazing but
reviews.comment: if you could add a fix for the search this would be the best comic app out there
reviews.author: Susan Hall

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: New laugh every day w/the best comic ever! Love that I can share on FB & save to my phone!
reviews.author: Sheila Baker

reviews.title: Great idea poor execution
reviews.comment: I love Garfield but this app suffers many flaws. Besides just poor design, the search bar doesn\'t work; if I take too long looking at a comic, the navigation buttons disappear; sometimes when performing a random search the app will time out and close; if I scroll down to read a Sunday comic it stays scrolled down and I can\'t see the next comic without manually realigning the page. It does what it says though-tons of Garfield!
reviews.author: Shawn Dobbs

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Every time I try open it, it crashes. I am using a samsung s3 and I did not expect this. 1 star until fixed. :-(
reviews.author: Burhanuddin Mukadam

reviews.title: Too many bugs
reviews.comment: Freezes up way too much.
reviews.author: Brian Mase

reviews.title: eh...
reviews.comment: I like the comics but can u fix the buttons disappearing problem
reviews.author: Esme Sanchez

reviews.title: Email?
reviews.comment: The app description still says you can email a comic, but I can no longer find the email feature.  Does it still exist?
reviews.author: Sissy M

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Thomas Savage

reviews.title: Amazikng
reviews.comment: I love garfield and this is a brilliant app !!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Chloe Soby

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I love it always I read the comics but pls can you make an update that it will save the comic date when closed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update DID NOT fix Facebook posting problem
reviews.comment: The app still won\'t post to Facebook!!!! It stopped a month or so ago and the update DID NOT fix it!!!!!! 1 star until this is fixed
reviews.author: Justin Coolidge

reviews.title: The interface is good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: sharath R

reviews.title: Nav buttons are fine
reviews.comment: To all the guys saying \"the nav buttons disappear\", tap the middle of the screen to bring them back. Or, tap left or right exactly where the buttons were (takes some practice) to continue on to the next comic (or previous).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FUN!!!
reviews.comment: I love Garfield,  and this app makes me laugh every time I down.
reviews.author: Evelyn Ulrich

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.comment: the best since 1978 :-)
reviews.author: Suwannee Swifty

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The UI always disappear after 2-5 seconds. can\'t see any of the buttons.
reviews.author: Alan Au

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: Awesome App! :)
reviews.author: Manny C

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: Love it so much it rocks
